metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5400 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Squid before 3.5.6 does not properly handle CONNECT method peer responses when configured with cache_peer, which allows remote attackers to bypass intended restrictions and gain access to a backend proxy via a CONNECT request.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> non-default configuration, and needs substantial backporting There are no current plans to fix this CVE in Ubuntu 12.04 LTS and Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
